ESRS E1 paragraph AR 39 (b)
Key Terms
GHG emission factors
Background
ESRS E1 paragraph AR 39 (b) states: ‘The undertaking shall disclose the methodologies, significant
assumptions and emissions factors used to calculate or measure GHG emissions accompanied by
the reasons why they were chosen and provide a reference or link to any calculation tools used’.
